issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: FairScheduler should preempt for a ResourceRequest and all preempted containers should be on the same node

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Containers to be preempted leak in FairScheduler preemption logic.

comments.body: Hi [~zxu], it seems the current preemption logic has many problems. I just updated one in [https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/YARN-4120?focusedCommentId=14735952&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-14735952]. I think a logic refactor is need, what do you think?
Of course we can also address these problems one by one in different jiras. If you like this, just kindly ignore the above comment.

\\
